home.legend: Find independent shops that deliver to you!
home.legend_placeholder: Worldwide open source project to save local stores!

result_success.description3: Please tell as many shop owners and shoppers about this service so more stores can survive!

home.result_fail: *No stores have signed up to deliver in your area yet! Please help us spread the word and get local stores and shoppers online asap! Share share share!

label.postal: Which postal codes can you deliver to?

placeholder.postal: Add up to 10 postal codes where you can deliver - do no add spacing in your postal codes - sperate different postal codes with a comma ','
